EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Re: Christmas Fair - Sunday 9th December - 10.00am - 1.00pm
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your continued interest in The King's School, Manila.
We are having our Christmas Fair on Sunday 9th December 10.00am - 1.00pm. Come and join us for a fun filled day of Christmas stalls, face painting, festive games and delicious food.
For more information please use the following link: http://www.kings.org.ph/en/school-news/events/christmas-fayre.aspx?page=1
I look forward to seeing you there.
Kind Regards, Mark Johnson Administration Manager The King's School, Manila Tel: +63 2 478 9859
